## Who Is Kelvin?

Kelvin is a Ghanaian-trained physician with clinical and research experience across both publicly and privately owned health facilities in Ghana. He is currently in the second year of a Master's in Public Health Program at the Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health with a concentration in Epidemiology. His current academic interests include maternal and chold health and data science.

Kelvin enjoys the thrills of escapism and actively seeks these thrill through novels, movies and video games!
